mapper.select: select ec.title, ec.price, ec.lesson_num, ecd.description, et.name teacher_name, es1.title two_subject, es2.title one_subject from edu_course ec LEFT JOIN edu_course_description ecd on ec.id = ecd.id LEFT JOIN edu_teacher et on ec.teacher_id = et.id LEFT JOIN edu_subject es1 on ec.subject_id = es1.id LEFT JOIN edu_subject es2 on ec.subject_parent_id = es2.id where ec.id = #{id}
